intro: Hemigraphis darntonii, commonly known as the silverleaf nerve plant, is a flowering plant native to the Caribbean and parts of Central America. The plant typically grows as a low-growing perennial, often forming dense mats in moist, shaded environments. Hemigraphis darntonii is often cultivated as an ornamental plant for its aesthetic appeal and ability to thrive in tropical and subtropical climates.
